column1: A Writ of Mandamus directing the 5th Respondent to reinstate the
2nd  Petitioner  with  due  promotions,  salary  increments  and  back

A
 Writ of Mandamus directing the 5th Respondent to pay the back
wages to the 1st Petitioner in accordance with the present salary
scale  from  the  date  of  purported  vacation  of  post  till  the  date  of
retirement with all retirement benefits is issued.
